author: senh
title: 10 beautiful British islands you've probably never heard of
text: BING NEWS: 10 beautiful British islands you've probably never heard of (CNN)Think Britain is just a small island off the coast of Europe? Think again. It's actually a huge number of small islands off the coast of Europe -- more than 6,000 in fact. Many are perfect for boat trips and slow excursions to far off, wild places. 07/31/2015 - 6:01 am | View Link Conquering Gros Piton We were on the beautiful island of St. Lucia in the British Virgin Islands. The water sparkled in different shades of aqua and the greenery was lush and exotic. This hike was going to provide me with awesome instagram photos.
